content.title: Percutaneous Mechanical Thrombectomy
content.description: Catheter-based removal of arterial or venous thrombus using mechanical devices that fragment, aspirate, or remove clot without open surgery.

device_categories.rotational: Rotarex, Cleaner - rotating mechanism fragments clot
